To summarize my review: Art started out passable then went below-mediocre and ended with just minimalistic outlines, literally. Storywise, it's weak NTR laden with your typical NTR-sauce hentai logic and loads of bullshit pretentious basing (especially FMC, calling herself a knight, but has no "unwavering stance"). Enjoy.
